title: HW3 Q5
content: Problem context: This is another basic problem that was a former exam problem and is there to help you appreciate more about the "systems" dimension of deep learning. How to tradeoff computation and memory... Again, this helps you understand that you can understand ideas even beyond what is explicitly taught in lecture or discussion.
